video_prompt:
**Movement & Change Prompt:**

A stern anime character shifts focus as background manga panels rapidly cycle through varied character expressions and dynamic poses. Text elements on the left side of the frame flash and alter. The central figure subtly adjusts her grip on a katana. The overall color palette actively transitions, emphasizing red, black, and white.
image_prompt: Anime style full-shot of a stern girl in a black school uniform with red accents, black hair in a high ponytail, holding a black and red katana. Dynamic manga panel background displaying other characters in grayscale/limited color with speech bubbles. Red, black, and white dominant color palette, with large stylized text elements and a "c29" graphic.
refined_video_prompt: An anime character's gaze subtly shifts, her expression altering. Behind her, manga panels rapidly cycle, displaying changing character expressions and dynamic poses. Text elements on the left side of the frame actively flash and morph. The central figure's hand subtly readjusts its grip. The entire color palette continuously transitions, highlighting red, black, and white as dominant tones.
